name: National MUSYM to MUKEY Lookup with Area Symbol
description: Lookup table mapping MUKEY (unique map unit key) to NATIONALMUSYM (national map unit symbol) and AREASYMBOL (survey area symbol), sorted by area symbol and MUKEY for logical ordering.

source.query_summary: SELECT DISTINCT m.mukey, m.nationalmusym, l.areasymbol FROM mapunit m INNER JOIN legend l ON m.lkey = l.lkey ORDER BY l.areasymbol, m.mukey

columns.name: mukey
columns.description: Unique identifier for the map unit

columns.name: areasymbol
columns.description: Area symbol for the survey area
